pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: あなたは部屋代を１ヶ月滞納している。
lessons.english: You're a month behind in your rent.

lessons.japanese: あなたは家賃を１ヶ月滞納している。
lessons.english: You're a month behind in your rent.

lessons.japanese: 料金滞納で電話を止められた。
lessons.english: My telephone service was cut off because of unpaid bills.

lessons.japanese: 彼は家賃をだいぶ滞納し、そのためアパートをたちのかされた。
lessons.english: He was way behind on his rent. As a result, he was evicted from his apartment.

lessons.japanese: 数日ならまだしも１０日も滞納している。
lessons.english: A few days would have been excusable, but you are in arrears for 10 days.

lessons.japanese: 数日ならまだしも１０日も滞納している。
lessons.english: A few days would have been excusable, but you are in arrears for 10 days.

lessons.japanese: 彼は家賃をだいぶ滞納し、そのためアパートをたちのかされた。
lessons.english: He was way behind on his rent. As a result, he was evicted from his apartment.

lessons.japanese: 料金滞納で電話を止められた。
lessons.english: My telephone service was cut off because of unpaid bills.

lessons.japanese: あなたは部屋代を１ヶ月滞納している。
lessons.english: You're a month behind in your rent.

lessons.japanese: あなたは家賃を１ヶ月滞納している。
lessons.english: You're a month behind in your rent.

lessons.japanese: トムは家賃を3ヶ月滞納している。
lessons.english: Tom is three months behind in paying his rent.

lessons.japanese: トムは家賃を3ヶ月滞納している。
lessons.english: Tom is three months behind in paying his rent.

lessons.japanese: トムは家賃滞納により家主から立ち退きを求められた。
lessons.english: Tom was evicted by his landlord for not paying rent.
